column4: hi there .. first: sry 4 my bad english .. how do i copy Partition A (ubuntu) to my new created Partiton B, all i have to do is copy all to my new ext4 partition, editing etc/fstab and then i must run grub-mkconfig, right?
or better: how do i copy ubuntu (which is on partition a) to partition b
as Nitsuga  pointed out, do not do it while 'a' is mounted
